cards.name: Photo Tutor
cards.aboutShort: A web application intended to be a tool to assist students with...
cards.aboutFull: Description: A web application intended to be a tool to assist students with limited camera access and to help educators translate fundamental photography concept to groups. It is a proof of concept for a future version that could be expanded to include being gamified and tutorials. This is an AngularJS app that uses Firebase for authentication, data storage, and hosting. It also uses HTML/CSS, Saas, Bootstrap, and Grunt.
